text: And God increases in guidance those who found [right] guidance�He said:This means that God will increase the insight (baṣīra) of those who are guided due to their faith in Him and their emulation (iqtidāʾ) of Muḥammad , and this is an increase in guidance (hudā) and clear light (nūr mubīn).His words, Exalted is He:
